Date Night
Date Night at Scarlettâs is the ultimate vibe. For $200, you and your plus-one get in before 11 PM, kick back in VIP seating, and enjoy dinner & drinks worth up to $200. Whether you're celebrating or just out for a good time, this package is a whole experienceâfood, drinks, and energy all night.

Featured

Kitchen Open Late
The number one gentlemen's club in Miami serves fresh food made daily, seven nights a week. Our kitchen stays open long after other restaurants and nightclubs shut down, serving until 5:30 am on weekdays and 7:30 am on Fridays and Saturdays. You can also enjoy a full dining experience next door at Rick's Steakhouse.
